github_metrics.push_event_commits: All commits involved in a Github Archive (https://www.gharchive.org/) push event
github_metrics.repo_owners: Metadata for repo owners, who may be user accounts or organizations. URLs on github are in the format github.com/<owner name>/<repo name>
github_metrics.repos_in_papers: Repositories that were extracted from the scholarly literature
github_metrics.repos_with_full_meta: Repositories and metadata extracted from any source relevant to our analysis (a superset of the repos in `repos_in_papers`)
github_metrics.star_events: Metadata for each time a repository was starred
